Package controllers

Class ExtendParkingController

java.lang.Object
controllers.ExtendParkingController
All Implemented Interfaces:
ClientAware
public class ExtendParkingController extends Object implements ClientAware
Controller for the "Extend Parking Time" screen. Allows a subscriber (or a terminal user) to extend an active parking session by 4 hours. The extension is allowed only if: - The session is still active (exitDate and exitHour are null) - It hasn't been extended before - If a subscriber is logged in, the session must belong to them The request is sent to the server and handled via onExtensionResponse().

    • setClient

      Parameters:

    • handleExtendClick

      private void handleExtendClick()
      Called when the "Extend" button is clicked. Validates the parking code and sends an extension request to the server. - If a subscriber is logged in, the request includes their subscriber code. - If used from a terminal, only the parking code is sent. Displays an error if input is missing or invalid.

    • onExtensionResponse

      public void onExtensionResponse(boolean success, String message)
      Called after the server responds to the extension request. Updates the screen with a success or error message.
      Parameters:
      success - true if the extension was processed successfully
      message - feedback message returned from the server
